description: The AWS::SecurityHub::PolicyAssociation resource represents the AWS Security Hub Central Configuration Policy associations in your Target. Only the AWS Security Hub delegated administrator can create the resouce from the home region.

ConfigurationPolicyId.description: The universally unique identifier (UUID) of the configuration policy or a value of SELF_MANAGED_SECURITY_HUB for a self-managed configuration
ConfigurationPolicyId.markdownDescription:
The universally unique identifier (UUID) of the configuration policy or a value of SELF_MANAGED_SECURITY_HUB for a self-managed configuration

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$|^SELF_MANAGED_SECURITY_HUB$  
Update requires: No interruption

TargetId.description: The identifier of the target account, organizational unit, or the root
TargetId.markdownDescription:
The identifier of the target account, organizational unit, or the root

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

TargetType.description: Indicates whether the target is an AWS account, organizational unit, or the organization root
TargetType.markdownDescription:
Indicates whether the target is an AWS account, organizational unit, or the organization root

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ACCOUNT | ORGANIZATIONAL_UNIT | ROOT  
Update requires: Replacement

AssociationStatus.description: The current status of the association between the specified target and the configuration
AssociationStatus.markdownDescription:
The current status of the association between the specified target and the configuration

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: SUCCESS | PENDING | FAILED  
Update requires: No interruption

AssociationType.description: Indicates whether the association between the specified target and the configuration was directly applied by the Security Hub delegated administrator or inherited from a parent
AssociationType.markdownDescription:
Indicates whether the association between the specified target and the configuration was directly applied by the Security Hub delegated administrator or inherited from a parent

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: APPLIED | INHERITED  
Update requires: No interruption

AssociationStatusMessage.description: An explanation for a FAILED value for AssociationStatus
AssociationStatusMessage.markdownDescription:
An explanation for a FAILED value for AssociationStatus

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

UpdatedAt.description: The date and time, in UTC and ISO 8601 format, that the configuration policy association was last updated
UpdatedAt.markdownDescription:
The date and time, in UTC and ISO 8601 format, that the configuration policy association was last updated

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

AssociationIdentifier.description: A unique identifier to indicates if the target has an association
AssociationIdentifier.markdownDescription:
A unique identifier to indicates if the target has an association

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
